Title: Episode 3
Plot: Swimming pools, inner-city reservoirs, and flooded cellars in suburban homes are being overtaken with prehistoric reptiles, which have all come through the space-time anomalies. The gang go to investigate, but Nick is more concerned with finding his wife.
GuestStars: Aled Pugh,  James Bradshaw,  Jake Curran,  Mark Wakeling,  Pascale Burgess,  Andrew French,  Abigail Aston
